name: Dungeon Archer
description:
Dungeon Archer is a top- down RPG/Dungeon Crawler game, focused not around melee combat, but a weapon sometimes neglected in this genre: the Bow.

Explore the dungeon, shooting monsters and unlocking chests as you become rich and powerful from the variety of loot you acquire. Each dungeon is randomly generated, so no two dungeon dives will ever be the same! 

Dungeon Archer is still in Alpha development, so many features are yet to be added. Development can be slow, as I am a one-man dev team creating this as a hobby, but I will do my best to continue to produce great content!

All code, art, and conceptualization by August Rothpletz.
